meanings.definition: Provide with necessary articles of equipment.
meanings.sent1: The knight accoutred himself with armor before heading into battle.
meanings.sent2: She accoutred her backpack with all the essentials for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: The chef accoutred his kitchen with the latest gadgets, making cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The detective accoutred himself with tools of the trade to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The explorer accoutred his expedition with maps and compasses to navigate the unknown terrain.

meanings.sent1: The accoutred soldier marched proudly in his uniform.
meanings.sent2: The accoutred hiker was ready for any challenge on the trail.
meanings.sent3: The accoutred athlete looked impressive in his gear before the big game.
meanings.sent4: The accoutred car was fully loaded with all the latest features.
meanings.sent5: The accoutred artist had all the tools needed to create beautiful paintings.
